name: Ice Ballerina: Dress Up Snow
description:
Find all cute girly fashion accessories hidden in the castle where the ice princess lives: makeup items,
bows and ribbons, bags and shoes, everything our princess needs in order to get dressed for the winter party is lost inside the magical castle! So,
be a good friend and help her search and find hidden objects before it’s too late!
- Find hidden objects in 3 different rooms
- Many objects to seek and find
- Limited time for each level
- Regular and silhouette mode
- Dress Up mode
